title: Generate a List of Top-Selling Products
description: A marketing manager needs a report of the top 10 best-selling products from the last quarter to plan a new campaign.

tasks.description: Query the sales database for all orders placed in the last quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves all relevant sales data.

tasks.description: Aggregate the data to count the total units sold for each product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the sales volume per SKU.

tasks.description: Sort the products by units sold in descending order and return the top 10.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an accurate report of the top 10 best-sellers.
